name: PolyCity Stories - The Affair
description:
The first short story from PolyCity.
A point and click adventure delving into the dark and dirty polygonated corners of the City of angles... mostly right angles

'The Affair' follows a soft boiled/over easy private detective as he unpicks an organised crime syndicate operating across the city.

This Early Access version of the game provides the complete Act 1 of the story.
